segments.advisor_message: Okay, so let's get into it. I need your, uh, dependent's name, like full name, if you have it?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, it's, uh, Jordan Smith, I think. Wait, let me just double-check that, yeah, Jordan Smith. I guess that's the full name.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And what about their date of birth? Just the date but make sure it's in the right format.
segments.client_message: Oh, right, um, it’s uh, 15-04-2018. Yup, that's it. Should be all good, I hope!
